name: Mekong Delta Home Stay Tour
description:
I am living and working in Ho Chi Minh City. I am an out-going man, want
 to make friends with foreigners to widen my network, share my culture 
and help the people.
My home town is from Long Xuyen City, An Giang Province, it is a 
very beautiful and peaceful Province of the Mekong Delta. I really want 
to introduce my home town to other friends who want to explore and 
experience Mekong Delta beauties and kind local people.
